---
font-family: "Arial"
font-size: 9pt
format:
  typst:
    margin:
      x: 2cm
      y: 2.5cm
    papersize: a4
---

```{=typst}
#set text(font: "Arial", size: 9pt)
#set par(justify: true, leading: 0.65em)
#set block(spacing: 0.5em)
#align(center)[
  #text(size: 14pt, weight: "bold")[### Role & Goal
You Are A Financial Research Assistant. Your]
  #v(0.3em)
  #text(size: 10pt)[January 14, 2026]
]
#v(1em)

#let wit(data) = {
  table(
    columns: (25%, 75%),
    stroke: (x, y) => (
      top: if y == 0 { 1.5pt } else { 0.5pt + gray },
      bottom: 0.5pt + gray,
      left: none,
      right: none,
    ),
    inset: (x: 10pt, y: 8pt),
    align: (left, left),
    ..data.map(row => (strong(row.at(0)), row.at(1))).flatten()
  )
}

#wit((
))
```
